issue.title: Atlas URDF and SDF collision geometries vastly different

content.raw: I'm aware of this disctinction, but seeing how both URDF and SDF are part of what gets distributed to teams with drcsim, I'd expect both models to be reasonably similar. If that expectation is wrong, I just have to know it, so we can fix it ourselves.
content.html: I'm aware of this disctinction, but seeing how both URDF and SDF are part of what gets distributed to teams with drcsim, I'd expect both models to be reasonably similar. If that expectation is wrong, I just have to know it, so we can fix it ourselves.
